text: وَلَئِن مَّسَّتْهُمْ نَفْحَةٌ مِّنْ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ يَـٰوَيْلَنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya, jika mereka ditimpa sedikit saja dari azab Tuhan-mu, pastilah mereka berkata: "Aduhai, celakalah kami, bahwasanya kami adalah orang yang menganiaya diri sendiri".
